statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_task_id, scheduled_date FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC
SELECT equipment_id, scheduled_date, completion_date FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE completion_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_task_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT equipment_id, scheduled_date, notes FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule

SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_task_id, scheduled_date, completion_date, notes FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1 ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC, maintenance_task_id ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_task_id, scheduled_date, completion_date, notes FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01' AND completion_date IS NULL ORDER BY equipment_id, scheduled_date ASC
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_tasks FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING total_maintenance_tasks > 5 ORDER BY total_maintenance_tasks DESC
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_task_id, scheduled_date, completion_date, notes FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY equipment_id ASC, scheduled_date DESC

SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_task_id, scheduled_date, DATE_PART('day', completion_date - scheduled_date) AS days_difference FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL AND scheduled_date <= current_date() ORDER BY days_difference DESC
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE schedule_id = 3;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, start_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_description, task_status FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE task_status <> 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE equipment_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, start_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE end_date > '2022-10-01';
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE schedule_id = 3 AND task_status IN ('Completed', 'In Progress') ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM MaintenanceTasks GROUP BY schedule_id HAVING total_tasks > 2 ORDER BY total_tasks DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_interval FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval > 30;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT schedule_id, task_description FROM MaintenanceTask ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval > 30;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_interval FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;

SELECT MaintenanceSchedule.schedule_id, MaintenanceSchedule.start_date, MaintenanceTask.task_description FROM MaintenanceSchedule JOIN MaintenanceTask ON MaintenanceSchedule.schedule_id = MaintenanceTask.schedule_id WHERE MaintenanceTask.task_status = 'pending';

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, MaintenanceSchedule.start_date, MaintenanceSchedule.end_date FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceSchedule.equipment_id WHERE MaintenanceSchedule.status = 'completed' ORDER BY MaintenanceSchedule.end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'A%' OR equipment_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY maintenance_interval ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, location, install_date FROM equipment WHERE id=1;
SELECT task_name, frequency, last_completed FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE equipment_id=2;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT name, specialization FROM technicians WHERE technician_id=3;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, location FROM equipment WHERE install_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency > 5 ORDER BY last_completed DESC;

SELECT equipment.name, maintenance_tasks.task_name, maintenance_schedule.schedule_date FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_tasks ON equipment.id = maintenance_tasks.equipment_id JOIN maintenance_schedule ON maintenance_tasks.task_id = maintenance_schedule.task_id WHERE completion_status = TRUE;

SELECT technicians.name, technicians.specialization, maintenance_tasks.task_name FROM technicians LEFT JOIN maintenance_tasks ON technicians.technician_id = maintenance_tasks.equipment_id ORDER BY technicians.specialization ASC, maintenance_tasks.task_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_type='Machine';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE scheduled_date='2022-12-25';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM MaintenanceTask WHERE is_completed=true ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_type DESC;

SELECT t.technician_name, a.assigned_date, m.task_name FROM Technician t JOIN TaskAssignment a ON t.technician_id = a.technician_id JOIN MaintenanceTask m ON a.task_id = m.task_id WHERE a.assigned_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY a.assigned_date ASC;

SELECT e.equipment_name, s.scheduled_date, s.scheduled_time, t.technician_name FROM Equipment e JOIN MaintenanceSchedule s ON e.equipment_id = s.equipment_id LEFT JOIN TaskAssignment a ON s.schedule_id = a.schedule_id LEFT JOIN Technician t ON a.technician_id = t.technician_id WHERE a.technician_id IS NULL;

SELECT e.equipment_name, COUNT(t.task_id) AS total_tasks FROM Equipment e LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedule s ON e.equipment_id = s.equipment_id LEFT JOIN MaintenanceTask t ON s.schedule_id = t.schedule_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name HAVING total_tasks > 3 ORDER BY total_tasks DESC;
